metadata.synopsis: A faded children's game marked on the floor - tic-tac-toe or hopscotch, maybe. Different races remark may or may not recall the game from their youth. Planar or gith might not recognize it - assume it's code.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Huh. Haven't seen that game in years.
0.context: NodeContext: Karlach: Little sing-song to the tune of 'one, two, buckle my shoe'
